akas from release info: The Living Universe World-wide (English title) (informal English title)

1.title: Luna. Vozvrashchenie
1.plot: Plans for lunar exploration today claimed five space-faring nations, including Russia and. Why, 40 years after the completion of the lunar program of the USSR and the USA humanity returns to the moon? The main reason is that only the moon can find ancient history of the Earth. I would like to know whether people stay there permanently, use the lunar mineral wealth in order to draw resources to power the earth?

2.title: Poiski Zhizni
2.plot: Today, when discovered over 400 planets, and even similar to Earth, scientists have once again started talking about the search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence - and a serious deterrent to human problem. You can search for water, oxygen and methane, that is, organic life, or signs of high technology. Today, scientists are going both ways simultaneously. In the 1960s and 70s in the existence of the inhabitants of Venus and Mars, believed not only science fiction writers, and scientists and designers of space applications. The film shows unique footage of the time and...

3.title: Zemlya i Venera. Sosedki
3.plot: It is hard to imagine two more similar in their characteristics of the planet - the Earth and Venus. Neighbors in the solar system. Venus only twice as much warm sun, and up to 70 years of the last century, scientists were convinced that there is only slightly warmer than on Earth. However, the climate on Earth and Venus is different as well as in our view differs from the paradise of hell. Why is the attention of scientists again focused on Venus? Will the new expedition to answer the question whether the Earth is waiting for the so-called "greenhouse effect" which ...

4.title: Solntse i Zemlya. Vspyshka
4.plot: Despite the fact that we observe the Sun continuously, we can not predict the behavior of the stars closest to us that determines our lives. Can you explain and predict the peaks of solar activity and to avoid negative consequences for a person? Why now, contrary to predictions, the sun is almost no spots? And how can today's scientific methods to find out what's going on inside the sun?
